answers.answer: Hi!  I cannot answer your question as I am not on Harvoni, nor do I have Diabetes, just wanted to say hello, and that we do have knowledgeable people with much experience on here.  Please be patient until someon on that med and/or with Diabetes sees your post and has a chance to respond.Good luck and Good Treating!  Slay that Dragon!! : -)Pat

Yep. I didn't do Harvoni but did have solvadi...same diff in a way. It created huge cravings for sweets. Threw my glucose out of whack and I don't have glucose issues normally nor a craving for sweets. Have you tried filling up on high probiotic yogurt in the morning? It may help with the unwanted increase in appetite.

I'm going into week 9 and like you I feel the occasional headaches mainly when I don't drink enough water, but my appetite hasn't increased.  My biggest problem is the crazy sleep patterns which leads to a little spaciness at work which I can definitely do without, but I'll take it for SVR!!
Thank you and my best wishes to your progress toward cure viral free..

question: The little headache from day to day I can do fine.A little upset digestion I can manage too.The biggest problem I have has been increased appedite which is throwing my diabetes out of whack,Is this normal for you too?
title: Harvoni week 13 or 24
